message.name: ERR_ADHOCBONUS_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: An AdhocBonus of this type already exists for the period %1d to %2d.

message.name: ERR_ADHOCBONUS_XRV_PRODUCT_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot add a bonus as this product has been canceled.
You cannot add a bonus as this product has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ADHOCBONUS_FV_BONUSTYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: A Bonus Type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ADHOCBONUS_RV_CANCELLED
message.locale: This record cannot be modified as it has already been canceled.
This record cannot be modified as it has already been cancelled.
